@Realjohndoe: umm it doesn't matter if we're in medieval times or modern, the flow of power is still the same no? the title might be miss leading but it's just an explanation for the control of power. If we want *"competent employees, public servants and transparent highly accountable PUBLIC administrators"* then we have to design a system that cultivate such individuals. 

**It's easy to point fingers and say people are doing stuff wrong but it might just be that the system forced them to behave badly.**
@Daniell Mesquita: true. But i don't think we should have abilities to stop them remotely tho,  that'd turn ZeroNet into ClearNet :P
